title: Software Developer – Contract based

title: Full Stack Intern

title: Semantics SEO Content Writer & Copywriter (Part-time)

title: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant – SE & DSA
description: Assisting in Software Engineering (SE) and Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA) undergraduate courses.
Conducting lab sessions, providing hands-on guidance, and helping students understand core programming and software concepts.
Grading assignments, maintaining academic records, and supporting exam preparation and evaluation.
In DSA, taught key topics including Linked Lists, Trees, Graphs, B-Trees, Disk Sorting, and traversal algorithms.
In SE, supported concepts like Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), UML diagrams, software design principles, and testing practices.
